title: 2 Br Elegant Apartment close to Havelock City
details:
2 bedroom fully furnished elegant apartment on the 3rd floor in Havelock Town. The well maintained condominium facilities include two lifts, gym, roof-top entertainment area, with air-conditioned reception area, reserved car park, auto-start standby Generator & 24hr security. Walking distance to a wide variety of restaurants including the Pizza Hut, Dominos & Kushmi & the 24 Hr Laughs Supermarket.

32" LCD TV with Digital Cable TV with BBC, DVD, and Free ADSL WI FI broadband, Fixed line telephone with inward access, Cooking Gas & Water. One bedroom is equipped with a 75"x60" Queen Size bed with an 8" spring mattress. Second bedroom is equipped with two single beds with 8" spring mattresses. En-suite bathrooms with hot water..
